name: Solana Fee Tracker
description: An app to track Solana fees

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/simple/price https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com/ https://api.devnet.solana.com/ wss://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com/ wss://api.devnet.solana.com/ https://api.testnet.solana.com wss://api.testnet.solana.com/; object-src 'self'
